description: Immerse yourself in the charm of Bavaria with this captivating 500-piece puzzle, showcasing a picturesque scene straight out of a fairy tale. As you piece together this delightful puzzle, you'll find yourself strolling down a quaint brick street adorned with colorful buildings illuminated by soft, inviting light, with tables and chairs set outside charming cafes, inviting you to imagine yourself savoring a leisurely meal al fresco. Friendly dogs wander the streets, adding to the idyllic atmosphere. Our 500pc piece jigsaws are crafted with premium quality materials and measure 49 x 36cm when complete. Great for Adults and ideal puzzles for Children 10 years old and up. Fully complies with all necessary UK and EU testing standards. Bestselling puzzle brand worldwide - With over 1 billion puzzles sold, our jigsaw puzzles make ideal gifts for women, great gifts for men and fit perfectly on our puzzle board. Our puzzles use an exclusive, extra-thick cardboard combined with our fine, linen structured paper to create a glare-free puzzle image and give you the best experience possible. #Positivelypuzzling - From fun family times together to long term health benefits and day-to-day mindful moments, there are so many positives about the humble Jigsaw! They make a great birthday gift or smashing Christmas gift.
